name: FlowEQ
headline: No-code workflow tool
description: FlowEQ is the trusted provider of workflow automation for teams that need to accelerate their work, especially complex processes and high-volume workflows that require human judgment. The FlowEQ Workflow Acceleration Platform includes interactive decision trees that are used by customer support, operations and product teams across all industries to improve accuracy and speed up important recurring work. Using FlowEQ customers get through high-stake recurring workflows 10x faster, saving their companies time and money every day. For additional information, visit www.floweq.com.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:customer-success; industry:compliance; industry:api; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Brittani Dunlap, Founder/CEO
founders.description: I am a homegrown Texan driven by technology, with a heart for hospitality! First-Time Founder and BrightReps CEO with 12+ years in Enterprise Tech sales, strategic planning and growth for Mid-Large corporations. I spend as many hours outdoors as possible, adore my dog and appreciate a great glass of wine. Ready to build an empire!

# TRUSTED BY TEAMS ALL OVER THE WORLD
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c388463b9df0315b88bef_Showtime.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c38c8a61973042c509346_tableau.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c3abcea080a672639a490_hydrow_logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c39cf3085bff0e9f08173_Sunpower.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c39dfdc92d48fb7b50198_fubo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c3a6663b9dfd5c8b89e16_Pulse.png)
# Speed up recurring work that requires a **human touch**
Our no-code workflow automation solution embeds within your current systems and lets your teams work faster where they are. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/624fa39f3a3a8c851fe814c9_FlowEQ-HomeAnimation-v3.gif)
## Built for teams that need to **accelerate** important work
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c594e7e78744d2a3b0dcb_CustomerSupport_Icon%402x.svg)
### Customer Support
  * Troubleshooting
  * RMAs
  * E-commerce returns and refunds
  * Replacement orders
  * Shipping
  * Escalations


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c5ac29c2d64fb421f8ae3_Membership_Icon%402x.svg)
### Membership & Billing
  * New client activation
  * Billing inquiries
  * Membership changes
  * Subscription plan changes


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620c5acc187e8ade93a1f4b9_Product_Icon%402x.svg)
### Product & Operations
  * Quality issue tracking
  * Defect tracking
  * Compliance reporting
  * Lease servicing
  * UCC filings


[All Industries And Solutions >](https://www.floweq.com/</industries/industry-solutions>)
## FlowEQ saves customers time and money **everyday**
### 5M
**Support tickets accelerated**
### 10x
**Faster customer resolution**
### 100%
**SOPcompliance**
### 50x
**Faster agent onboarding**
# We’re **different** than other workflow automation solutions
And by different, we mean better. FlowEQ’s no-code solution streamlines work, ensures high-stake processes are followed correctly every time, and does this all within your current systems. 
### **Embeds within your CRM**
So your teams can work within the applications they already know and don’t have to learn a whole new system.
### **Smart Flows & Accelerators**
Design decision tree workflows that guide your team through the steps you want them to follow – with accelerators that automate steps behind the scenes.
### **Pre-built Connectors**
Instantly get data and take action across your applications without ever having to open up any other screens.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620d57e3f609a63932e3a6cf_Quote%402x.svg)
FlowEQ is an absolute miracle for a business like ours with complex troubleshooting workflows. I wish I had access to it in all of my previous businesses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620d5a1c0b6993dcaba9eb74_Headshot.png)
John Doe, CEO
Acme Inc.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620d5a1c0b6993dcaba9eb74_Headshot.png)

Privacy Preference Center
When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.
[Reject all cookies](https://www.floweq.com/<#>)[Allow all cookies](https://www.floweq.com/<#>)
Manage Consent Preferences by Category
Essential
**Always Active**
These items are required to enable basic website functionality.
Marketing
Essential
These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.
Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.

# We’re **different** than other workflow automation solutions
And by different, we mean better. FlowEQ’s no-code solution streamlines work, ensures high-stake processes are followed correctly every time, and does this all within your current systems. 
### **Embeds within your CRM**
So your teams can work within the applications they already know and don’t have to learn a whole new system.
### **Smart Flows & Accelerators**
Design decision tree workflows that guide your team through the steps you want them to follow – with accelerators that automate steps behind the scenes.
### **Pre-built Connectors**
Instantly get data and take action across your applications without ever having to open up any other screens.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620d57e3f609a63932e3a6cf_Quote%402x.svg)
FlowEQ is an absolute miracle for a business like ours with complex troubleshooting workflows. I wish I had access to it in all of my previous businesses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620b38163ad9173da4a0ea88/620d5a1c0b6993dcaba9eb74_Headshot.png)
John Doe, CEO

generated_description:
**FlowEQ: Accelerating Workflow with No-Code Solutions**  

FlowEQ, founded in 2018 and hailing from the Y Combinator Batch W21, is on a mission to redefine the way teams approach their workflows through no-code automation. Located in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, this small but powerful team of seven has set its sights on making complex processes more efficient and dramatically faster.

At its core, FlowEQ offers a Workflow Acceleration Platform. This platform provides interactive decision trees, allowing customer support, operations, and product teams to streamline their high-volume workflows while ensuring accuracy. The result? Teams can execute high-stakes recurring tasks a staggering ten times faster, which translates into significant savings in time and money for companies utilizing its solution.

### Key Features:
- **No-Code Automation**: FlowEQ allows users to embed its tools within existing systems, automating behind-the-scenes steps and enhancing those that require human judgment.
- **Smart Flows & Accelerators**: Users can design decision trees tailored to their workflows, ensuring that teams follow predefined steps that enhance compliance and efficiency.
- **Pre-Built Connectors**: The platform integrates seamlessly with more than 100 business applications, including popular CRMs such as Salesforce and Zendesk, allowing teams to work in familiar environments without the hassle of learning new software.

### Use Cases:
FlowEQ caters to a variety of industries, including customer service, e-commerce, medical devices, and more. Here are a few specific applications:
- **Customer Service Automation**: Effortlessly manage support tickets and fast-track resolutions.
- **Quality Tracking**: Ensure compliance and manage product quality issues effectively.
- **Lease Servicing**: Automate legal filings with ease.

### Performance Metrics:
FlowEQ's effectiveness is backed by impressive statistics: 
- Over **5 million support tickets** accelerated,
- Customer resolutions completed **10 times faster**,
- A **50-fold improvement** in agent onboarding speed.

### The Competitive Edge:
What sets FlowEQ apart from traditional workflow solutions is its no-code approach. Users can implement improvements without relying heavily on IT, lowering barriers to entry for all types of organizations. Its focus on integrating within existing software ecosystems means that adapting to FlowEQ feels like an upgrade rather than a complete overhaul.

In sum, FlowEQ stands out as a transformative tool aimed at companies seeking to optimize their workflows without the complexity of traditional coding environments. Their platform not only enhances productivity but also empowers teams to focus on what truly matters: delivering exceptional service and value to their customers. 

For those interested in learning more or seeking a demo, visit [FlowEQ's website](https://www.floweq.com).
